General.Name: Sinodata Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinodata Co., Ltd. engages in the application software development, and provision of technical services and related computer information system integration services in China and internationally. The company offers blockchain platform application solutions in the fields of finance, commerce, government supervision, and people's livelihood; and a multi-party secure computing platform for finance, customs, operators, government affairs, medical care, judicial supervision, industrial Internet, etc. applications. It also provides financial technology and data center services; and sells products related to computer technology and other derivative businesses. The company serves financial institutions, governments and public utilities, and enterprises. Sinodata Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
